Class DatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
  DatabaseConnector

public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object

DatabaseConnector is the class which connects to a mysql database on some network and contains a list of methods to be used by the MIDlet application and the quiz administration panel

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Msc - Manchester Metropolitan University
